intro: Cyclostemon mindanaensis, commonly known as the Mindanao cyclostemon, is a rare flowering plant native to the Philippines. It belongs to the family Meliaceae, which includes mahogany and other tropical trees. The plant is characterized by its unique, palmate leaves and fragrant, yellowish-green flowers that bloom in clusters. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in lowland forests. Due to its limited distribution and habitat loss, it is considered a vulnerable species.
